csl_rtcAux.h File Reference

This is the RTC Auxilary Header File which exposes the various CSL Functional Layer API's to configure the RTC Module. More...

Detailed Description

This is the RTC Auxilary Header File which exposes the various CSL Functional Layer API's to configure the RTC Module.
